CustomField.description: Assessment Criterion marked as 'Comments Recommended' will be checked for comments when calculating the Assessment Completeness level. If the user does not have comments included against 'Comments Recommended' criterion, full marks will not be awarded for completeness on the Assessment. Details for how the Assessment Completeness is marked can be found in the online help.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Assessment Criterion marked as 'Comments Recommended' will be checked for comments when calculating the Assessment Completeness level. Details for how the Assessment Completeness is marked can be found in the online help.
CustomField.label: Comments Recommended
